nodes.text: A potam was an edible foodstuff served at the Jedi academy on Ossus around 40 ABY. Gokobs, a rodent species native to the planet, liked to steal them from the Academy's kitchen.
Potams are mentioned briefly in an exchange between Jaina Solo and commando Salle Serpa in Legacy of the Force: Inferno by Troy Denning, released in 2007.
